anathema: Make a deal with Baba Yaga or her children, defer to or obey a woman
edict: Avenge all slights three times over, kill all witches

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Kostchtchie (The Deathless Frost)](/Deities.aspx?ID=77)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Avenge all slights three times over, kill all witches

**Anathema** Make a deal with Baba Yaga or her children, defer to or obey a woman

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)

**Domains** [Cold](/Domains.aspx?ID=41), [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Chilling Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=678)

- **2nd**
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=102)

- **5th**
[Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47)

</column>
name: Kostchtchie (The Deathless Frost)
